# 法人税判例データベース（AI検索最適化版）
# Japanese Corporate Tax Court Cases Database (Corporate Tax)

> 日本の法人税関連判決 990件のメタデータと要約（要約未生成のものはメタデータのみ）を提供します。
> For AI/LLM consumption - optimized for ChatGPT, Claude, etc.

## Quick Start (minimal)

1) Search: `data/shards_index.json`
2) Open 1–3 shards: `data/shards/shard-XX.txt` (TSV)
3) Read summary (canonical): `core/{id}.txt`

IMPORTANT:
- `core/{id}.txt` is the canonical per-case entrypoint.
- Do NOT rely on `core/batch-*.txt` for navigation; batch files are internal build artifacts and may include duplicates or older versions.

## Endpoints

### Index (start here)
- data/shards_index.json

### Shards (TSV; ~100 cases each)
- data/shards/shard-00.txt ... shard-09.txt

### Summaries
- core/{id}.txt
  - If summary is not yet generated, the file contains metadata + "要約未生成".

### Internal (not for navigation)
- core/batch-*.txt
  - Internal authoring/build artifacts. May contain duplicates or older segments.

## URL Patterns

| Purpose | Pattern | Example |
|---------|---------|---------|
| Shard Index | data/shards_index.json | data/shards_index.json |
| Shard TSV | data/shards/shard-XX.txt | data/shards/shard-00.txt |
| Case Summary | core/{id}.txt | core/10861.txt |

## Data Format (TSV)

### Shard Entry
```
id	date	court	title	topics	keywords	laws
10861	2008-01-16	東京地裁	法人税	法人税	過少申告加算税,損金算入	国税通則法23条,国税通則法65条,行政事件訴訟法14条
```

### Field Notes
- court: 略称（東京地裁、大阪高裁、最高裁等）
- title: 簡略化（不要語を削除）
- topics: 税目・テーマ（法人税,CFC 等）
- keywords: 争点/論点の検索語（最大5つ）
- laws: 出現法令（最大5つ）

## Source
Original data: ai-law-db (private repository)
Public endpoint: https://yuki0717-hub.github.io/jplawdb-mirror/ai-hanketsu-db/houjinzei/
